radiographic_examinations.findings: Markedly increased F-18 FDG uptake in the walls of the aorta and the subclavian arteries, mildly increased F-18 FDG uptake in the soft tissues around the shoulders and hips, and some spots of increased uptake in the soft tissues around the spine. No abnormal uptake was noted in the temporal arteries.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased uptake was noted, which was indicative of large cell vasculitis based on clinical criteria and prior history.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal bone scan and showed only degenerative joint disease in the lumbar spine.
